Module org.kohsuke.github.api
Package org.kohsuke.github

Class GHMembership

java.lang.Object
org.kohsuke.github.GHMembership
public class GHMembership extends Object
Represents a membership of a user in an organization.
Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi
